cast.overview: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.
cast.title: Baby Driver

details.biography: Brogan is a natural born performer. He spends hours a week in acting, improv, voice and dance training. He has enjoyed attending workshops with coaches and casting agents like Todd Etelson, John D'Aquino, Krisha Bullock, Howard Meltzer and Matt Newton. Brogan is a member of SAG. He is represented in NY, NC, GA and CA. Brogan has spent the last several summers in NY and in LA.
details.name: Brogan Hall
